text:
e="preserve">Ernestine Moller Gilbreth, Mrs. Carey (April 5, 1908 – November 4, 2006) was an American author. She was born in New York City. With her brother, Frank Bunker Gilbreth Jr., they wrote the semi-autobiographical book "Cheaper by the Dozen". She also wrote "Belles on Their Toes".
Carey dued on November 4, 2006 in Fresno, California at the age of 98.
